
<task>
<question_img>http://<LU LEMMA="open" CAT="A">open</LU>.ifmo.ru/<LU LEMMA="image" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="p">images</LU>/a/a0/2268341_int025.gif</question_img>
<question>
The figure shows the <LU LEMMA="interference" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interference</LU> <LU LEMMA="pattern" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">pattern</LU> on the <LU LEMMA="plane" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">plane</LU> P from the <LU LEMMA="Fresnel" CAT="N" DRV="POSESSIVE" FLX="TABLE" TYPE="Prop" Nb="s">Fresnel</LU> <LU LEMMA="biprism" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">biprism</LU>. <LU LEMMA="biprism" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">Biprism</LU> <LU LEMMA="refractive" CAT="A">refractive</LU> index is n, diffract is α. If α <LU LEMMA="change" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="p">changes</LU> slightly, how will the <LU LEMMA="interference" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interference</LU> <LU LEMMA="pattern" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">pattern</LU> alter?
</question>
<answers>
<answer right="no">	The <LU LEMMA="interference" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interference</LU> <LU LEMMA="pattern" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">pattern</LU> will move.</answer>
<answer right="yes">The <LU LEMMA="width" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">width</LU> of the <LU LEMMA="interference" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interference</LU> <LU LEMMA="fringe" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">fringe</LU> will grow.</answer>
<answer right="no">	The <LU LEMMA="width" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">width</LU> of the <LU LEMMA="interference" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interference</LU> <LU LEMMA="fringe" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">fringe</LU> will reduce.</answer>
<answer right="no">	The <LU LEMMA="interference" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interference</LU> <LU LEMMA="pattern" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">pattern</LU> will spread.</answer>
<answer right="no">	No right answer.</answer>
</answers>
